publications.title: Generation of an induced pluripotent stem cell line from a patient with Stargardt disease caused by biallelic c.[5461–10T>C;5603A>T];[6077T>C] mutations in the ABCA4 gene

donor.disease_description: biallelic c.[5461–10T>C;5603A>T];[6077T>C] mutations in the ABCA4 gene

genomic_modifications.description: biallelic c.[5461–10T>C;5603A>T];[6077T>C] mutations in the ABCA4 gene

genomic_characterisation.summary: Analysis of 16 microsatellite markers confirmed LEIi018-A was derived from the patient’s fibroblasts (FB) (data not shown).

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Western Australia Human Research Ethics Committee
